publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / beta maṣāḥǝft

sourceDesc.p: A TEI file created from Ethio-SPaRe data

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5

place.settlement: wäräda Ganta ʾAfäšum, ṭabiya Baḥǝra - Sǝḥeta, qušät Mäläkusäyto

note.ab: Däbr. Two churches located at the site: the older is placed on the rock, the recent, very modest and still under construction is located on the slope closer to the road.

18 Mss. photographed: MALM-001 “ The Harp of the praise”;MALM-002 “Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael”; MALM-003 “Homiliary for the Feasts of St. Michael”; MALM-004 “Four Gospels”; MALM-005 “Miracles of Mary”; MALM-006 “Missal”; MALM-007 “Book of the Funeral Rite”; MALM-008 “Praise of God ”; MALM-009 “Homily for commemeration of the Saviour of the World”; MALM-010 “Vita of Gäbrä Mikaʾel”; MALM-011 “Book of the letter; Regulations concerning the priest; Excerpts from Zəmmare”; MALM-012 “Book of the letter; Regulations concerning the priest; Excerpt from Zəmmare”; MALM-013 “Psalter”; MALM-014 “Loosening of Spell”; MALM-015 “Miracles of Jesus”; MALM-016 “Vita of Gäbrä Mikaʾel”; MALM-017 “Magical prayers against evil eye and diseases”; MALM-018 “Homily on the 24 Heavenly priests; Vita of ʾAbba Yoḥanni”.
Tabots of Mary, Zä-Mikaʾel ʾArägawi (old church), Gäbrä Mikaʾel (new church).
